Generative Pre-trained Transformer 3 is an autoregressive language model that uses deep learning to produce human-like text
a chatbot launched by OpenAI in November 2022. It is built on top of OpenAI's GPT-3.5 family of large language models and is fine-tuned with both supervised and reinforcement learning techniques
